Reference

parsnip API

Model

rnn()

General interface to recurrent neural network models

Parameters (Dials)

timesteps()

Number of timesteps used to generate a forecast

Modules

model_rnn()

A recurrent neural network model

Data transformations

as_tensor()

Convert an object to tensor

ts_dataset()

Create a time series dataset object

as_ts_dataset()

Create a torch dataset for time series data

as_ts_dataloader()

Quick shortcut to create a torch dataloader based on the given dataset

as.vector(<torch_tensor>)

Convert torch_tensor to a vector

Metrics

nnf_mape()

Mean Absolute Percentage Error

nnf_mae()

Mean Absolute Scaled Error

Data

weather_pl

Weather data from Polish "poles of extreme temperatures" in 2001-2020

tiny_m5

A prepared subset from M5 Walmart Challenge Dataset in one data frame
